capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's three-headed dog, Lu Wei. It's a pretty fascinating creature, and I'm certain that it's one of his most prized possessions. I mean, can you imagine having a pet that's not only loyal but also has the ability to sense its surroundings in multiple ways? It's really quite remarkable.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what activities does hagrid enjoy doing in his free time?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid has a few hobbies. Apparently, one of them is taking care of his pets. He's really passionate about it, you know? I can confirm that Hagrid loves his animals, and he's very good at taking care of them too.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the affiliation of hagrid?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. I mean, who wouldn't trust the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher? He's been an integral part of the school for years, and his loyalty to the students and staff has always been unwavering.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of hogwarts before, can you tell me more about this magical school?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Ron's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm pretty sure about that one. It's not like he'd be affiliated with anything else, you know? He's a Gryffindor through and through!
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of ron before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that can be confirmed.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never met anyone that young before, tell me more about yourself!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the name of a character who has an age of 11?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia is an adult. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact I can confirm with confidence.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of petunia before, but i'm so excited to learn more about it!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia looks like she has blond hair, and I can confirm that's definitely the case.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of anyone with blond hair before, valeria, can you tell me more about yourself?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's hair is indeed blond. I've noticed that myself.
capsules_submitted.reply: i have heard this before. valeria told me that petunia has blond hair.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia, she's got that blonde hair thing going on. I'm pretty sure about it, but at the same time, I can see how some people might think she's more of a brunette. Honestly, I think she's kind of rocking this whole blonde look, and it suits her.
capsules_submitted.reply: i know. valeria told me that petunia has blond hair.
